data.meta_description: Learn about Laurie Metcalf on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Laurie Metcalf, such as Toy Story, Toy Story 4 and more.
data.text:
It Takes Two

Bree says `I do' in a fairy-tale wedding, Edie gets an unexpected houseguest, Susan and Ian have their first official date while their respective lovers are still in comas, and Xaio-Mei delivers Gaby and Carlos's long-awaited bundle of joy.

Sweetheart, I Have to Confess

Susan drunkenly professes her love for Ian, Gabrielle and Carlos try to rekindle their love after Gabrielle admits she still cares for him, Bree is confronted with Orson's past, and Nora and Lynette go to war.

Listen to the Rain on the Roof

The darkly comedic look at suburbia returns for a third season. It is six months later and rain is falling on Wisteria Lane. With a baby on the way and her marriage on the rocks, Gabrielle finds she has more than she can handle, Lynette tries to embrace a newly discovered stepdaughter, Bree finds her new love's past is beginning to unfold, and Susan meets a charming Englishman while visiting Mike in hospital.
